item.title: 🏗️ How this blog was set up
item.description: Aren’t we here to talk about technology? My needs I’m looking for a solution with no maintenance that helps me to focus on writing content and not maintaining the full system. So don’t expect a microservice architectured CMS on AWS Lambda though we might use it for some projects later :) I also want a system with multilingual support to write in Globish 🇬🇧🇺🇸 and French 🇫🇷. Hugo: a static website generator Logo of the Hugo project This blog is generated by Hugo which is a nice static website generator like Jekyll or Gatsby.

item.title: But why?
item.description: “Que diable allait-il faire dans cette galère - Les fourberies de Scapin (Acte II, scène 7)" Why this blog? This blog is intended to summarize the information and knowledge I collected around my tech journey on the Internets. It’s an idea around for long time now but I make it real now because I have some free time ahead. I will try hard to keep publish regularly over time.
